sensor_current_spawn: Temperature sensor is currently at spawn point: ({0}, {1}, {2})
sensor_set_spawn: Temperature sensor set to spawn point: ({0}, {1}, {2})
sensor_set_location: Temperature sensor set to your current location: ({0}, {1}, {2})
sensor_not_configured: Temperature sensor location is not properly configured.
command_unknown: Unknown command. Available commands: /tempsensor setspawn, /tempsensor setcurrlocation
no_permission_sensor: You don't have permission to change the temperature sensor location. Only server administrators can do this.
sensor_admin_note: (Only server administrators can change this location.)
greenhouse_tooltip: Shows temperatures adjusted for greenhouse effect (+5°C)
sensor_location_unreachable: [!] Warning: Temperature sensor location is not loaded. Consider using '/tempsensor setcurrlocation' to move the sensor to an active area.
sensor_location_unreachable_info: The measurement location at ({0}, {1}, {2}) is not currently loaded. Temperature monitoring is paused until the area becomes accessible.
